Angular $q.reject().description: Creates a promise that is resolved as rejected with the specified reason.

body: // 通过设置 'Content-Type': undefined，不仅把 Content-Type 设置为 multipart/form-data，还填充上当前的 boundary
// 如果手动设置为 'Content-Type': multipart/form-data，后台会抛出异常：the request was rejected because no multipart boundary was found
// boundary 是随机生成的字符串，用来分隔文本的开始和结束
// 设置 transformRequest: angular.identity ，anjularjs transformRequest function 将序列化我们的 formdata object，也可以不添加

Angular Controller.description:
Angular 1.x Controller
依赖采用 Annotation 形式
['dependencies', fn(dependencies)]，
防止代码压缩参数破坏

Angular Directive(Decorator).description:
Angular 1.x Directive
装饰器型指令(Decorator)
用 link 函数，不是一个主体，只是附加行为能力，不使用新的作用域或独立的作用域

body: throw new Error('Options should be an object!');
throw new Error('Template (' + param.template + ') could not be loaded. ' + error);
// change any model outside of the Angular context,
// to inform Angular of the changes by calling \$apply() manually
ng-options="${2:item} as ${2:item}.label for ${2:item} in ${1:items} track by ${2:item}.${3:id}"
${0:This field has an input error.}

Angular translate.description:
Angular 1.x Translation by a filter(angular-translate)
<ANY translate>AS_TEXT</ANY>
 <ANY translate="AS_ATTRIBUTE"></ANY>
 <ANY translate>{{ 'AS_INTERPOLATION' }}</ANY>
